page.title: Provento — a facility solution providers' new visual identity for a push on the market
page.desc: As a facility solutions provider wants to make a push on the market they were looking for a fresh and modern look to their visual identity. The revision included an complete redesign of all visual elements of the company.
page.overview: Provento works as a facility solution provider. Meaning, their work consist of creating custom solutions for customers who require facility services. As they aimed for a break on the marked they found themselves in need of a visual revision. The logo was designed based on the company. The logo resembles the character P at the same time as it encompasses several layers. These layers represent the daughter companies that Provento work with to deliver their services.
